title: Venice Image Skills
description: Skills for generating images using the Venice AI API.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether this skill category is enabled

api_key.title: Venice API Key
api_key.description: Optional API key for Venice AI services. If not provided, the system key will be used.

safe_mode.title: Safe Mode
safe_mode.description: If true, explicit images will be blurred.

hide_watermark.title: Hide Watermark
hide_watermark.description: If true, the generated image will not have a watermark.

negative_prompt.title: Default Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Default negative prompt to use if none is provided in the skill call.

rate_limit_number.title: Rate Limit Number
rate_limit_number.description: Number of requests allowed per time window. Only applies if using an agent-specific API key.

rate_limit_minutes.title: Rate Limit Minutes
rate_limit_minutes.description: Time window in minutes for rate limiting. Only applies if using an agent-specific API key.

states.title: Skill States
states.description: States for each Venice Image skill (disabled, public, or private)

image_generation_flux_dev.title: Image Generation (Flux-Dev)
image_generation_flux_dev.description: Generate images using Venice AI's Flux Dev model (research, art workflows).

image_generation_flux_dev_uncensored.title: Image Generation (Flux-Dev-Uncensored)
image_generation_flux_dev_uncensored.description: Generate images using the uncensored Flux Dev model (unrestricted, NSFW).

image_generation_venice_sd35.title: Image Generation (Venice SD3.5)
image_generation_venice_sd35.description: Generate images using Stability AI's SD 3.5 Large (art, design).

image_generation_fluently_xl.title: Image Generation (Fluently-XL)
image_generation_fluently_xl.description: Generate images using Fluently-XL (aesthetics, lighting, realism).

image_generation_lustify_sdxl.title: Image Generation (Lustify-SDXL)
image_generation_lustify_sdxl.description: Generate images using Lustify SDXL (photorealistic, focus on NSFW).

image_generation_pony_realism.title: Image Generation (Pony-Realism)
image_generation_pony_realism.description: Generate images using Pony Realism (high-detail, realistic, anime/characters).

image_generation_stable_diffusion_3_5.title: Image Generation (Stable Diffusion 3.5 - Alt ID)
image_generation_stable_diffusion_3_5.description: Generate images using Stability AI's SD 3.5 Large (alternative API ID).
